title: 187: Sex-cations, Partner Communication, & Non-monogamy w/ Taylor Nolan
itunes:title: 187: Sex-cations, Partner Communication, & Non-monogamy w/ Taylor Nolan
description:
The Broads are joined by one of their favorites from #bachnation, Taylor Nolan! They discuss her recent conversation with Chris Harrison, going back to school to become a sexologist, first experiences and advice regarding consensual non-monogamous relationships, the importance of communicating with a partner, her sex vacations (aka sex-cations), and much more! 


TAYLOR NOLAN: 

Follow her: https://www.instagram.com/taymocha/


Listen to her podcast “Let’s Talk About It”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/lets-talk-about-it-with-taylor-nolan/id1321043863


“Talking With Taylor” Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/taymocha?fan_landing=true


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS AND THEIR DEALS!:

CANDID - Candidco.com/CHATTY code: CHATTY
